# oneuptime_user_data (Data Source)

User data data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "oneuptime_user_data" "example" {
  name = "example-user_data"
}
```

## Schema

- `id` (String) Identifier to filter by. Optional.
- `name` (String) Name to filter by. Optional.
